desc: Pure-X is a very versatile and user-friendly choice for surface disinfection, sanitization and space deodorization. It is safe, easy to use and alleviates odor while eliminating 99.99% of all bacteria. Spray on all surfaces to kill E. coli, MRSA, staph, Listeria and Coronavirus (Covid-19)

layout.text: Unlike other disinfectants PureFx is pure. Our technology is eco-friendly and OMRI organic certified, requiring no special disposal or handling requirements. The activated solution has a neutral pH. There are no corrosion concerns.
